title: The Wave
synopsis: A Norwegian geologist has just 10 minutes to save as many people as possible when a tsunami strikes a fjord community.

title: Thelma
synopsis: A devout college student struggles to understand the connection between her feelings for a female classmate and her seemingly supernatural powers.
genre: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Romance, Thriller

title: In Order of Disappearance
synopsis: When he sets out to avenge his son's murder, mild-mannered snowplow driver Nils sparks a war between a Norwegian mobster and his Serbian rival.

title: Ragnarok
synopsis: An archaeologist sets out to find a link between an ancient shipwreck and the Viking apocalypse known as Ragnarok, only to make a chilling discovery.

title: Occupied
synopsis: In the near future, Russia initiates a 'silk glove' invasion of Norway to restart oil production, but soon uncertainty, chaos and danger erupt.

title: The Heavy Water War
synopsis: When the Nazis secure a heavy water plant to realize their plan to create an atomic bomb, the Norwegian Allies struggle to sabotage the operation.

title: The Last King
synopsis: In 1206, as civil war rages, Norway's dying king entrusts two warriors to protect his infant son against internal forces determined to kill the heir.

title: Nobel
synopsis: A series of incidents in Afghanistan set complicated political and personal events in motion for a returning Norwegian Special Forces officer.

title: Dag
synopsis: Dag is a couples therapist whose philosophy in life is that people should be alone, and he encourages his patients to do just that.

title: Escape
synopsis: Signe is captured after merciless killers wipe out her family. Learning she faces a fate worse than death, she runs away -- and now the chase is on.

title: Acquitted
synopsis: A successful businessman comes home to fix his townâ€™s failing company, but the specter of his acquittal for murder 20 years before still haunts him.

title: Battle
synopsis: After Amalie's dad goes bankrupt, the young dancer's affluent life collapses. But she finds a new beat to follow after meeting hip-hop dancer Mikael.

title: Borderliner
synopsis: To protect his family, a police detective covers up a murder case. But when his partner suspects foul play, he is trapped in a dangerous game on duty.

title: Varg Veum
synopsis: Brooding private eye Varg Veum lends his services to the troubled and often finds himself entangled in deadly conspiracies and hidden corruption.

title: Homesick
synopsis: After they meet for the first time as adults, unhappy dance teacher Charlotte and her half-brother Henrik begin a life-changing, taboo relationship.

title: Supervention
synopsis: This documentary follows a group of talented skiers and snowboarders as they travel to exotic destinations and execute daring feats.

title: Pitbullterje
synopsis: A gentle-hearted but bullied student finds his life turned upside down when a boy who claims to have a deadly pit bull moves to town.

title: Operasjon Arktis
synopsis: After stowing away on a rescue helicopter, three children find themselves stuck on a remote island with little hope of rescue.

title: Olsenbanden Jr. Gar under vann
synopsis: When the rich GyldenlÃ¸we's arrive at the orphanage to select a son, Egon is their million crown choice. But the GyldenlÃ¸wes are not what they seem.

title: Doktor Proktors Prompepulver
synopsis: Two children help their neighbor, an eccentric inventor, use his latest creation -- the world's most powerful fart powder -- to fly.

title: Breaking the Cycle
synopsis: The warden of Halden, Norway's most humane prison, tours the U.S. prison system to urge a new approach emphasizing rehabilitation.

title: Hokus pokus Albert Ã…berg
synopsis: When his father says he's too young to have a dog, 7-year-old Albert turns to an imaginary friend and a magician for help changing his dad's mind.

title: Doktor Proktors tidsbadekar
synopsis: Dr. Proktor goes back in time to stop his beloved's wedding and can't get back. So Lise and Bulle step in -- and discover that the past can be a gas.

title: Mormor og de Ã¥tte ungene
synopsis: After her family's truck is stolen, young Mona and her grandmother, who has ditched her retirement home to visit her grandkids, hunt down the thief.

title: Maniac
synopsis: A nondescript man in a mental hospital has an exciting life of adventure and romance -- in his head. He may be insane, or maybe he's just having fun.

title: Elling 2: Mors Elling
synopsis: In this prequel, loner Elling's aging mother attempts to get him to come out of his shell and make more out of his life by taking him on a holiday.
